description: The SLT segment defines requests, responses, and notifications of sterilization lots and supply item descriptions. This message may be used for CPD (Central Supply) and OR (Sub-sterile area outside of an Operating Room) mode.

1.name: Device Number
1.description: The unique identifier of the device (assigned by user, not assigned by the software application; e.g.: 01).

2.name: Device Name
2.description: The name of the device associated with the device number in SLT-1 (e.g., VAC).

3.name: Lot Number
3.description: A unique number associated with an instance of a sterilization/decontamination cycle assigned by the instrument-tracking system.

4.name: Item Identifier
4.description: The Item Identifier is a unique code assigned to the material item by the Instrument-tracking software application to identify the item being sterilized or decontaminated.

5.name: Bar Code
5.description: The special identification code, printed as a set of vertical bars of differing widths, used on instruments to identify them and provide for rapid, error-free input by a barcode scanning device. The coding can include numbers, letters or a combination of both.
